title: Researchers spotted a zero-day exploit kit abusing CVE-2025-9911 in SSL-VPN gateways
body: Researchers spotted an active zero-day exploit kit abusing CVE-2025-9911 in several SSL-VPN gateways. Administrators are urged to apply interim mitigations.

title: AWS is triaging a sev-1 outage in eu-south-1 affecting S3 and SNS
body: AWS reports a sev-1 outage in eu-south-1, impacting S3 and SNS APIs. Engineers are rolling back a faulty networking update.

title: Okta confirms a breach exposing 73 K session tokens; password resets underway
body: Okta acknowledged that threat actors exfiltrated 73 000 session tokens via a compromised support account. The company has forced global password resets.

title: Google Cloud investigating high-severity vuln (CVE-2025-1024) enabling container escape
body: Google Cloud engineers are validating reports of CVE-2025-1024, a container-escape flaw in GKE Autopilot. A patch is expected within 12 h.

title: Microsoft detects mass exploitation of CVE-2025-8409 against Exchange Online
body: Microsoft warns that CVE-2025-8409, a post-auth RCE in Exchange Online, is being mass-exploited. Defender ATP detections have been updated.

title: Fortinet ships emergency patch for CVE-2025-9977 allowing admin bypass in FortiOS
body: Fortinet issued a hotfix for CVE-2025-9977 after proof-of-concept code surfaced on GitHub. Users should update immediately.

title: Elastic investigates data exfiltration via misconfigured snapshot repository
body: Elastic Cloud Engineering is examining reports that a misconfigured snapshot repo leaked sensitive indices to the public internet.

title: Zoom confirms zero-day (CVE-2025-9188) in macOS client exploited in-the-wild
body: Zoom pushed version 7.2.11 to address CVE-2025-9188, a code-execution flaw already exploited in targeted attacks against macOS users.

title: Cloudflare mitigates large-scale DDoS peaking at 158 M rps against HTTP/2 endpoints
body: Cloudflare automatically mitigated a record-breaking DDoS surge that peaked at 158 million requests per second targeting HTTP/2 endpoints.

title: Atlassian warns of malicious app impersonating Confluence Questions on Marketplace
body: Atlassian Security removed a malicious app posing as ‘Confluence Questions’ that installed a backdoor on self-managed servers.

title: Netflix introduces retro 8-bit theme in its TV app
body: Netflix’s latest update adds an optional retro 8-bit UI theme for nostalgic viewers. No security changes were included.

title: Apple showcases translucent MacBook concept at WWDC
body: Apple’s design team unveiled a translucent MacBook prototype, emphasizing sustainability and recyclability.

title: Steam adds collectible profile frames for summer sale
body: Valve’s Steam platform now lets users equip animated frames around profile avatars during the 2025 summer sale event.

title: Slack introduces ‘focus mode’ with automatic status updates
body: Slack’s new focus mode dims channels and automatically sets Do-Not-Disturb status for preset intervals.

title: IBM Cloud launches dark-mode dashboard theme
body: IBM Cloud’s console now supports a system-wide dark mode, improving accessibility for low-light environments.

title: Google Cloud debuts AI-assisted architecture diagrams in DrawIO
body: A new integration auto-generates architecture diagrams from Terraform files within Google Cloud’s DrawIO add-on.

title: Oracle announces Java 23 preview with pattern-matching tweaks
body: At JavaOne, Oracle teased Java 23 featuring record pattern improvements and sequenced collections.

title: NVIDIA showcases RTX 6090 with dual-slot liquid cooler at SIGGRAPH
body: NVIDIA’s upcoming RTX 6090 GPU features a built-in dual-slot liquid cooling solution, aimed at AI workstations.

title: Zoom rolls out 3-D avatars for informal meetings
body: Zoom’s new 3-D avatar feature lets participants appear as customizable characters during casual calls.

title: DigitalOcean adds cost-estimator widget to billing console
body: DigitalOcean’s new billing widget projects monthly spend based on active droplets and bandwidth usage.
